text: Hopea montana is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo. The Latin specific epithet montana refers to mountains or coming from mountains.Archibald William Smith ==References== montana Category:Trees of Sumatra Category:Trees of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea montana
